name: Color Maze - Light your world
description:
Free and exciting new lights up puzzle game.

Swipe to move your vibrant light through the maze and light it up. Complete each puzzle with amazing colors and lights by covering every path and corner. It will feel spectacular to complete each maze and light it up with bright and fresh colors.

Color maze is free and takes only a few swipes to master.

FEATURES
- Free, fun puzzles and mazes
- Awesome lights and colors
- Relaxing gameplay
- Free to play, hard to master
- Bright colorful lights

----
